descriptionHtml:
Had a request on making a sneaky follower that wasnt a nord or an elf. Here she is, Madae. All the way from Daggerfall, she has fled from the bounty that her father put on their head. Now settled in a shack in Falkreath, she is trying to make a living.

She is perked in lockpicks, sneak and light armor. Prefers 1h, bows and light armor.

Im using: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13646 for the armor. Endorses!
author: Wylda
